data.caption: Update On Listing Of 53942887 Equity Shares Of Advent Hotels International Limited.
data.news_body: Update on Listing of 53942887 Equity shares of Advent Hotels International Limited

data.caption: Listing of Equity Shares of Advent Hotels International Ltd
data.news_body: Trading Members of the Exchange are hereby informed that effective from November 13 2025 the Equity Shares of Advent Hotels International Ltd (Scrip Code: 544446) are listed and admitted to dealings on the Exchange in the list of T Group Securities. For further details please refer to the notice no. 20251111-9  dated November 11 2025.
